name: Wp-map-markers
body:
### Welcome to WP Map Markers.
WP Map Markers is a WordPress plugin based on the Google Maps API v3. It allows you to add Store Locator type maps to your posts and pages. You could use it to display your store or office branches, your photos if you have a photoblog, anything really.

### Features
Support for multiple maps (not on the same page / post though)
Different marker icons ( currently 6 color variations, more to come)
Street view
Autocomplete search
Directions
Feature filtering
List of nearby locations



### Authors and Contributors
This plugin is being developed by @pdewouters.

### Support or Contact
Found a bug? Open an issue or better, submit a pull request with a fix!
Once the plugin is up at WordPress.org, you'll be able to use the forums there for support questions.
tagline: A WordPress plugin to display Google Maps on your website. Uses the Store Locator library and API v3
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
